account.settings.banner.beta.language: आपने अपनी भाषा को {beta_language} पर सेट किया है, जो वर्तमान में पूरी तरह से अनुवादित नहीं है। आप ट्रांसिफ़ेक्स समुदाय में शामिल होकर और {beta_language} बोलने वाले शिक्षार्थियों के लिए अंग्रेजी से अनुवाद जोड़कर इस भाषा का पूर्ण अनुवाद करने में हमारी सहायता कर सकते हैं।

id.verification.requirements.card.id.tex: You need a valid identification card that contains your full name and photo, such as a driver’s license or passport.

id.verification.privacy.need.photo.answe: हम आपकी वेरिफीकेस्न फोटोस का एस्टेमाल आपकी आइडैनटिटि को कन्फ़र्म करने के लिए और सर्टिफिकेट की वैलिडिटि को एनसुर करने के लिए यूस करते है|
id.verification.privacy.do.with.photo.qu: What does {siteName} do with this photo?
id.verification.privacy.do.with.photo.an: We securely encrypt your photo and send it our authorization service for review. Your photo and information are not saved or visible anywhere on {siteName} after the verification process is complete.
id.verification.access.blocked.title: पहचान की जाँच
id.verification.access.blocked.enrollmen: You are not currently enrolled in a course that requires identity verification.
id.verification.access.blocked.pending: You have already submitted your verification information. You will see a message on your dashboard when the verification process is complete (usually within 5 days).
id.verification.photo.enable.detection.p: If checked, a box will appear around your face. Your face can be seen clearly if the box around it is blue. If your face is not in a good position or undetectable, the box will be red.
id.verification.photo.enable.detection.i: If checked, a box will appear around the face on your ID card. The face can be seen clearly if the box around it is blue. If the face is not in a good position or undetectable, the box will be red.
id.verification.photo.feedback.correct: फ़ेस आपका अच्छे पोसिस्न में है|
id.verification.photo.feedback.two.faces: एक से ज़्यादा फ़ेस डेटेक्ट किया जा रहा है|
id.verification.photo.feedback.no.faces: कोई भी चेहरा डेटेक्ट नही किया जा रहा|
id.verification.photo.feedback.center.ce: गलत पोसिस्न| कमेरा से बहुत नजदीक है|
id.verification.camera.access.title: कमेरा पेरमिस्न्स
id.verification.camera.access.skip: स्किप करे और इमेज फ़ाइल अपलोड करे
id.verification.camera.access.success: ऐसा मालूम पड़ता है जैसे आपका कमेरा काम कर् रहा है और तैयार है|
id.verification.camera.access.failure: It looks like we're unable to access your camera. You will need to upload image files of you and your photo id.
id.verification.camera.access.failure.te: It looks like we're unable to access your camera. Please verify that your webcam is connected and that you have allowed your browser to access it.
कमेरा एक्सैस को इनेबल करे क्रोम में:
क्रोम को ओपेन करे|
सेटिंग्स> के लिए और नवीगेट करे|
For Windows: Alt+F, Alt+E, or F10 followed by the spacebar
मैक के लिए: कमांड+,
Under the "Privacy and security" tab, select "Site Settings" and then "Camera."
Under "Blocked," find "edx.org" and select it.
In the "Permissions" section, update the camera permissions to "Allow."
इंटरनेट एक्सप्लोरर में कमेरा एक्सैस एनेब्ल करने के लिए:
Open the Flash Player Settings Manager by navigating to Windows Settings > Control Panel > Flash Player.
Select the "Camera and Mic" tab, and then select the "Camera and Microphone Settings by Site" button.
Choose "edx.org" from the list of websites and change the permissions by selecting "Allow" in the dropdown menu.
फाइरफॉक्स में कमेरा असेस्स एनेब्ल करने के लिए:
फ़ायरफ़ॉक्स ओपेन करे|
Enter "about:preferences" in the URL bar.
Select the "Privacy & Security" tab, and navigate to the "Permissions" section.
Next to "Camera," select the "Settings…" button.
सर्च बार में, एंटर करे "edx.org."
In the status column for "edx.org," select "Allow" from the drop down.
"सेव चेंजेस" सिलैक्ट करे|
To enable camera access in Safari:
Open Safari.
Click on the Safari app menu, then select "Preferences." You can also use Command+, as a keyboard shortcut.
Select the "Websites" tab and then select "Camera."
Select "edx.org" and change the camera permissions to "Allow."
id.verification.camera.access.failure.un: It looks like your browser does not support camera access.
The Chrome browser currently does not support camera access on iOS devices, such as iPhones and iPads.
Please use another browser to complete Identity Verification.
id.verification.photo.tips.title: मददगार फोटो टिप्स
id.verification.photo.tips.description: Next, we'll need you to take a photo of your face. Please review the helpful tips below.
id.verification.photo.tips.list.title: Photo Tips
id.verification.photo.tips.list.descript: एक सफल फोटो लेने के लिए, सुनिश्चित करें कि:
id.verification.photo.tips.list.well.lit: आपका चेहरा अच्छी तरह से चमक रहा है।
id.verification.photo.tips.list.inside.f: आपका पूरा चेहरा फ्रेम के अंदर फिट बैठता है।
id.verification.portrait.photo.instructi: When your face is in position, use the Take Photo button below to take your photo.
id.verification.camera.help.sight.questi: What if I can't see the camera image or if I can't see my photo to determine which side is visible?
id.verification.camera.help.sight.answer: You may be able to complete the image capture procedure without assistance, but it may take a couple of submission attempts to get the camera positioning right. Optimal camera positioning varies with each computer, but generally the best position for a headshot is approximately 12-18 inches (30-45 centimeters) from the camera, with your head centered relative to the computer screen. If the photos you submit are rejected, try moving the computer or camera orientation to change the lighting angle.

You may be able to complete the image capture procedure without assistance, but it may take a couple of submission attempts to get the camera positioning right. Optimal camera positioning varies with each computer, but generally, the best position for a photo of an ID card is 8-12 inches (20-30 centimeters) from the camera, with the ID card centered relative to the camera. If the photos you submit are rejected, try moving the computer or camera orientation to change the lighting angle. The most common reason for rejection is inability to read the text on the ID card.
id.verification.camera.help.difficulty.q: अगर मुझे परेशानी होती है अपने हैड के पोसिस्न को प्लेस करने में कमेरा के रेलतीवे में तो?
अगर मुझे अपने आइ डी को जगह पर रखने में दिक़्क़त होती है अपने कमेरा के रेलतीवे में तो?
id.verification.camera.help.difficulty.a: If you require assistance with taking a photo for submission, contact {siteName} support for additional suggestions.
id.verification.id.photo.unclear.questio: Is your ID card image not clear or too blurry?
id.verification.id.tips.title: Helpful Identification Card Tips
id.verification.id.tips.description: Next, we'll need you to take a photo of a valid identification card that includes your full name and photo, such as a driver’s license or passport. Please have your ID ready.
id.verification.id.tips.list.clear: Ensure that you can see your photo and clearly read your name.
id.verification.id.photo.title.camera: Take a Photo of Your Identification Card
id.verification.id.photo.title.upload: Upload a Photo of Your Identification Card
id.verification.id.photo.instructions.ca: When your ID is in position, use the Take Photo button below to take your photo. Please use a passport, driver’s license, or another identification card that includes your full name and a picture of your face.
id.verification.id.photo.instructions.up: Please upload a photo of your identification card. Ensure the entire ID fits inside the frame and is well-lit. The file size must be under 10 MB. Supported formats:
The file you have selected is not a supported image type. Please choose from the following formats:
The file you have selected is too large. Please try again with a file less than 10MB.
id.verification.name.check.title: Double-Check Your Name
id.verification.name.check.instructions: Does the name below match the name on your photo ID? If not, update the name below to match your photo ID.
id.verification.name.check.mismatch.info: If the name below does not match your photo ID, your identity verification will be denied.
id.verification.name.error: Please enter your name as it appears on your photo ID.
id.verification.name.label: नाम
id.verification.account.name.photo.alt: Photo of your ID to be submitted.
id.verification.review.title: अपनी तस्वीरों की समीक्षा करें
id.verification.review.description: सुनिश्चित करें कि हम आपके द्वारा प्रदान की गई तस्वीरों और जानकारी के साथ आपकी पहचान को सत्यापित कर सकते हैं।
id.verification.review.portrait.label: Your Portrait
id.verification.review.portrait.alt: Photo of your face to be submitted.
id.verification.review.id.label: Your Identification Card
id.verification.review.id.alt: Photo of your identification card to be submitted.
id.verification.submission.alert.error.f: A photo of your face is required. Please retake your portrait photo.
id.verification.submission.alert.error.i: A photo of your ID card is required. Please retake your ID photo.
id.verification.submission.alert.error.n: A valid account name is required. Please update your account name to match the name on your ID.
id.verification.submission.alert.error.u: One or more of the files you have uploaded is in an unsupported format. Please choose from the following:
id.verification.submitted.title: Identity Verification in Progress
id.verification.submitted.text: We have received your information and are verifying your identity. You will be notified when the verification process is complete (usually within 5 days). In the meantime, you can still access all available course content.
id.verification.photo.upload.help.title: Upload a Photo Instead
id.verification.photo.camera.help.title: Use Your Camera Instead
id.verification.photo.upload.help.text: If you are having trouble using the photo capture above, you may want to upload a photo instead. To upload a photo, click the button below.
id.verification.photo.camera.help.text: If you are having trouble uploading a photo above, you may want to use your camera instead. To use your camera, click the button below.

notification.preference.web.label: Web
notification.preference.guide.body: Notifications for certain activities are enabled by default,
If checked, this name will appear on your certificates and public-facing records.
account.settings.field.name.modal.certif: Choose a preferred name for certificates and public-facing records
account.settings.delete.account.text.3.e: You may also lose access to verified certificates and other program credentials like MicroMasters certificates. You can make a copy of these for your records before proceeding with deletion. {actionLink}.
account.settings.delete.account.text.3: You may also lose access to verified certificates and other program credentials. You can make a copy of these for your records before proceeding with deletion.
account.settings.delete.account.subheade: हमे खेद है आपको जाते देख!
account.settings.delete.account.text.1: Please note: Deletion of your account and personal data is permanent and cannot be undone. {siteName} will not be able to recover your account or the data that is deleted.
account.settings.delete.account.text.2: Once your account is deleted, you cannot use it to take courses on {siteName}.
account.settings.delete.account.text.2.e: एक बार आपका खाता हटा दिए जाने के बाद, आप इसका उपयोग edX ऐप, edx.org, या edX द्वारा होस्ट की गई किसी अन्य साइट पर पाठ्यक्रम लेने के लिए नहीं कर सकते हैं। इसमें आपके नियोक्ता या विश्वविद्यालय के सिस्टम से edx.org तक पहुंच और MIT ओपन लर्निंग, व्हार्टन एक्जीक्यूटिव एजुकेशन और हार्वर्ड मेडिकल स्कूल द्वारा प्रस्तावित निजी साइटों तक पहुंच शामिल है।
account.settings.delete.account.text.3.l: Follow these instructions for printing or downloading a certificate
account.settings.delete.account.text.war: Warning: Account deletion is permanent. Please read the above carefully before proceeding. This is an irreversible action, and you will no longer be able to use the same email on {siteName}.
account.settings.delete.account.text.cha: क्या आप अपना ईमेल, नाम, या पासवर्ड बदलना चाहते है?
account.settings.delete.account.please.u: सभी सोश्ल मीडिया अकाउंट को अनलिंक करे|
account.settings.delete.account.modal.te: You have selected "Delete My Account". Deletion of your account and personal data is permanent and cannot be undone. {siteName} will not be able to recover your account or the data that is deleted.
If you proceed, you will be unable to use this account to take courses on {siteName}.

If you proceed, you will be unable to use this account to take courses on the edX app, edx.org, or any other site hosted by edX. This includes access to edx.org from your employer's or university's system and access to private sites offered by MIT Open Learning, Wharton Executive Education, and Harvard Medical School.
account.settings.delete.account.modal.en: यदि आप अभी भी अपना खाता जारी रखना और हटाना चाहते हैं, तो कृपया अपना खाता पासवर्ड डालें:
account.settings.delete.account.error.un: क्षमा करें, आपके अनुरोध को संसाधित करने में एक त्रुटि हुई। बाद में पुन: प्रयास करें।
account.settings.delete.account.modal.af: हमें खेद है कि आप जा रहे हैं! आपका खाता शीघ्र ही हटा दिया जाएगा।

ईमेल सूची से हटाने सहित खाता विलोपन, हमारी प्रणाली के माध्यम से पूरी तरह से संसाधित होने में कुछ सप्ताह लग सकते हैं। यदि आप पहले ईमेल से बाहर निकलना चाहते हैं, तो कृपया किसी भी ईमेल के पाद लेख से सदस्यता समाप्त करें।
account.settings.message.demographics.se: एक एर्र आगया जब रेटरिएव और सेव करने का प्रयास किया जा रहा था आपके अकाउंट को| कृपया थोड़ी देर बाद फिर प्रयास करे|
account.settings.field.demographics.ethn: सिलैक्ट करे सभी जो अप्लाई हुआ है
account.settings.field.demographics.inco: फॅमिली इंकम रेंज को सिलैक्ट करे
account.settings.name.change.title.id: This name change requires identity verification
account.settings.name.change.warning.one: Warning: This action updates the name that appears on all certificates that have been earned on this account in the past and any certificates you are currently earning or will earn in the future.
account.settings.name.change.warning.two: This action cannot be undone without verifying your identity.
account.settings.name.change.id.name.lab: Enter your name as it appears on your unexpired student, work, or government-issued identification card.
account.settings.name.change.id.name.pla: Enter the name on your photo ID
account.settings.name.change.error.gener: A technical error occurred. Please try again.
account.settings.editable.field.password: We've sent a message to {email}. Click the link in the message to reset your password. Didn't receive the message? Contact {technicalSupportLink}.
आपका प्रेवीयस रेकुएस्ट प्रोग्रैस में है, कृपया कुछ देर बाद वापिस प्रयास करे|
There was a problem disconnecting this account. Contact support if the problem persists.
account.settings.sso.no.providers: कोई भी अक्कौंट्स इस समय पर लिंक नही किया जा सकता|
id.verification.request.camera.access.in: In order to take a photo using your webcam, you may receive a browser prompt for access to your camera. {clickAllow}
id.verification.requirements.account.man: Your account settings are managed by {managerTitle}. If the name on your photo ID does not match the name on your account, please contact your {profileDataManager} administrator or {support} for help before completing the Photo Verification process.
id.verification.requirements.card.device: You need a device that has a camera. If you receive a browser prompt for access to your camera, please make sure to click {allow}.
id.verification.account.name.summary.ale: Your account settings are managed by {managerTitle}. If the name on your photo ID does not match the name on your account, please contact your {profileDataManager} administrator or {support} for help.
idv.submission.alert.error: We encountered a technical error while trying to submit ID verification. This might be a temporary issue, so please try again in a few minutes. If the problem persists, please go to {support_link} for help.
